title: The Dove Sketches Beauty Scam
author: Not provided in the text
dek: Dove's "real beauty" campaign isn't selling beauty products; it's a clever marketing ploy that positions Dove as the authority on beauty, building trust and making consumers more susceptible to purchasing their products later.  The ad uses artistic sketches and a focus on inner beauty to bypass cynicism and create a sense of self-acceptance, ultimately manipulating viewers into associating Dove with genuine, ethical beauty.
